subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jordan Staal scored twice, and Sidney Crosby’s goal and assist, amid a succession of fights, lifted the host Pittsburgh Penguins to a 6-1 victory over the Flyers.
snippet: Jordan Staal scored twice, and Sidney Crosby’s goal and assist, amid a succession of fights, lifted the host Pittsburgh Penguins to a 6-1 victory over the Flyers.
